root.message: The SOURCE_TYPE field for indicator 4-a-1, translated into all languages

languages.language:
(1) Administrative data from schools and other providers of education or training

(2) Cross-national learning assessments

(1) Données administratives provenant d’écoles et d’autres prestataires d’enseignement ou de formation

(2) Évaluations transnationales de l’apprentissage
